div.bibl: Rovnost Ludu, (Equality of People) Chicago, Illinois, March 5th, 1913. (Weekly) [THE ONLY SLOVAK ARCHITECT IN ILLINOIS](Advertisement)

body.p: John Slovinec is the first and only Slovak architect in the State of Illinois.

He opened his office in Chicago on 2123 W. 51st Street. He had practical experience in building banks, hospitals, schools etc. Complete plans regarding building will be in his full care and cost very reasonable.
